text: King of Jazz is a 1930 American musical comedy movie directed by John Murray Anderson and starring Paul Whiteman, John Boles, Laura La Plante, Jeanie Lang, Jeanette Loff, Bing Crosby, Al Rinker, Harry Barris, William T. Kent. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and won an Academy Award in 1930. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies
title: King of Jazz
